definitions: 存じる[ぞんじる] (v1) to think, feel, consider, know, etc.
english: Welcome to Cosmo Canyon. Are you familiar with this land?
japanese: ようこそコスモキャニオンへ。この地のことはごぞんじですか？

definitions: 集まる[あつまる] (v5r, vi) to gather, to collect, to assemble
english: People from all over the world gather here to seek the Study of Planet Life.
japanese: ここには世界中から『星命学』を求める人々があつまってきます

definitions: 定員[ていいん] (n) fixed number (of people), prescribed number (of regular personnel, students, etc.), quota, numerical limit, complement,capacity (of a bus, boat, theatre, etc.), seating capacity
english: Ummgah! I'm sorry it's full now, so I can't let you enter.
japanese: んが！今は定員いっぱいなので中には入れてあげられません

definitions: 学ぶ[まなぶ] (v5b) to study (in depth), to learn, to take lessons in
english: Leaving already? But it appears your friends still want to learn more about the Planet…
japanese: おや、もうご出発ですか？あなたのお友だちはまだ星について学びたいみたいですが……

definitions: 無用[むよう] (adj-na, n) useless, futile,unnecessary, needless,not on business, unrelated, unauthorised, unauthorized,prohibited, banned, forbidden
english: Hm? If you're looking for Bugenhagen, he went to the Sealed Door.
japanese: あれ？ブーゲンハーゲン様なら『無用の扉』のほうへ行かれましたよ

definitions: ブー (int) beep, honk (car horn), buzz (buzzer), boo (wrong answer, like buzzer on quiz shows)
english: Remember, there's a steel door on the way to Bugenhagen's room.
japanese: ホラ、ブーゲン様のお部屋へ行くとちゅうのあの鉄の扉ですよ

definitions: とちる (v5r, vi) to flub (one's lines),to be flustered, to be confused,to bungle, to mess up, to blunder
english: Remember, there's a steel door on the way to Bugenhagen's room.
japanese: ホラ、ブーゲン様のお部屋へ行くとちゅうのあの鉄の扉ですよ

definitions: ずっと (adv) continuously in some state (for a long time, distance), throughout, all along, the whole time, all the way,much (better, etc.), by far, far and away,far away, long ago,direct, straight
english: What's that door there for anyhow? It's been closed forever…
japanese: ホントにあの扉なんの役にたつんでしょう？ずーっと閉じたままで……

definitions: 不吉[ふきつ] (adj-na, n) ominous, sinister, unlucky, inauspicious
english: Oh, it's you. This is terrible. The color of that unlucky star…
japanese: ああ、あなたたちですか。大変なことになってしまいましたね。あの不吉な星の色……

definitions: 怖がる[こわがる] (v5r, vi) to be afraid of, to fear, to dread, to be nervous (about), to be shy (of)
english: The children are all so scared that they won't even go outside.
japanese: 子供たちなんか、こわがって外へ出てこようとしないんですよ

definitions: 心配[しんぱい] (n, vs) worry, concern, anxiety, uneasiness, fear,care, help, aid, assistance
親拝[しんぱい] (n) worship by the emperor at a shrine
心肺[しんぱい] (n) heart and lungs,cardiopulmonary,heart and lung machine
english: I'm worried something might happen to Bugenhagen now of all times…
japanese: こんな時にブーゲン様にまでもしものことがあったら……しんぱいです

definitions: 支え[ささえ] (n) support, stay, prop
english: Bugenhagen is what keeps our hearts strong…
japanese: ブーゲンハーゲン様は今の私たちの心のささえです……

definitions: 一族[いちぞく] (n) family, relatives, dependents,household
english: My tribe were protectors of those who appreciate this beautiful canyon and the Planet.
japanese: 私の一族はこの美しい谷と星を理解する人々を守ってくらしてきた

definitions: 勇ましい[いさましい] (adj-i) brave, valiant, gallant, courageous,stirring, vigorous, rousing
english: My brave mother fought and died here, but my cowardly father left her… I am the last of my race.
japanese: だが勇ましい戦士であった母は死にふぬけの父は逃げだし一族は私だけになってしまった

definitions: 戦士[せんし] (n) soldier, combatant, warrior
english: My brave mother fought and died here, but my cowardly father left her… I am the last of my race.
japanese: だが勇ましい戦士であった母は死にふぬけの父は逃げだし一族は私だけになってしまった

definitions: 見下げる[みさげる] (v1, vt) to look down over, to look down on
english: Yes. My father was a wastrel.
japanese: ああ。父は見下げたふぬけ野郎だ

definitions: 使命[しめい] (n) mission, errand,task, duty, obligation
english: And so the mission I inherited from my ancestors is to protect this place. My journey ends here.
japanese: だから、ここを守るのは残された私の使命だ。私の旅はここで終わりだ

definitions: 一休み[ひとやすみ] (n, vs) (short) rest, breather, break
english: That's perfect. Why don't we take a break too? We can meet back here in a while, OK?
japanese: ちょうどいいわ。私たちも一休みしない？しばらく自由行動ね！

definitions: ぼちぼち (adj-na) little-by-little, gradually, slowly, soon,not bad, passable, so-so
english: I'm just dead tired. Everyone, how 'bout some rest?
japanese: もうヘロヘロですわ。みなさん、ぼちぼち休みにしませんか？

definitions: キャンドル (n) candle
english: This fire is called 'Cosmo Candle'. It has burned for generations.
japanese: この火はね。『コスモキャンドル』なのです。むかーしむかしからもやされつづけてるのです

definitions: 燃やす[もやす] (v5s, vt) to burn,to burn with (emotion, feeling), to be fired up
萌やす[もやす] (v5s, vt) to sprout
english: This fire is called 'Cosmo Candle'. It has burned for generations.
japanese: この火はね。『コスモキャンドル』なのです。むかーしむかしからもやされつづけてるのです

definitions: 守る[まもる] (v5r, vt) to protect, to guard, to defend,to keep (i.e. a promise), to abide (by the rules), to observe, to obey, to follow
english: It is a holy flame that protects this canyon.
japanese: つまり、この谷をまもる聖なる炎ってわけなのです

definitions: 長老[ちょうろう] (n) elder, senior,senior monk,dean, presbyter, patriarch
english: The elders said something horrifying occurred, but I really don't know much else about it.
japanese: とってもこわーいことがあったって長老はいってたけどあたし、よくわからないのです

definitions: 神秘[しんぴ] (n, adj-na, adj-no) mystery, mysteriousness, secret
english: So this is Cosmo Canyon… Quite a mysterious place.
japanese: これがコスモキャニオン……なるほど、神秘的な場所ですね

definitions: 見学[けんがく] (n, vs) inspection, study by observation, field trip
english: Why don't you look around Cosmo Canyon while I fix the car?
japanese: 車がなおるまでコスモキャニオンを見学されては？

definitions: 受け取る[うけとる] (v5r, vt) to receive, to get, to accept,to take, to interpret, to understand
english: Please, take 1000 gil
japanese: １０００ギル受けとってくれ

definitions: 揶揄う[からかう] (v5u) to ridicule, to tease, to mock, to chaff, to razz, to banter with, to make fun of, to poke fun at, to make cracks about
english: …You don't even have that much. Don't tease me, okay?
japanese: ……そんなお金持ってないじゃないですか。からかわないでください

definitions: ソファ (n) sofa, couch
english: There was a bottle on the sofa there a couple of days ago…was it yours?
japanese: この前、あそこのソファーにきれいなビンが置いてあったんですがあなたがたのですか？

definitions: 天文台[てんもんだい] (n) astronomical observatory
english: Yeah? I heard there's an awesome observatory here. I'd like to see it if I have a chance.
japanese: やはりそうですか。なんでもここにはスゴイ天文台があるそうですからね。ぜひ一度見てみたいものです

definitions: 脅かす[おどかす] (v5s, vt) to threaten, to menace, to intimidate,to startle, to frighten, to scare
english: Don't scare me like that. I almost fell over.
japanese: おどかさないでくださいよ。危うく落ちるところだった

definitions: 危うい[あやうい] (adj-i) dangerous, risky, hazardous, perilous, precarious,in danger, in jeopardy, critical, grave, at risk,uncertain, unreliable, insecure, unsteady, doubtful,close (i.e. a close call), narrow
english: Don't scare me like that. I almost fell over.
japanese: おどかさないでくださいよ。危うく落ちるところだった

definitions: 正しい[ただしい] (adj-i) right, correct,proper, righteous, just, honest, truthful, lawful
english: Mmm… I think the teachings of the 'Study of Planet Life' are true.
japanese: う～ん……『星命学』の教えはたしかに正しいです。そう思います

definitions: パブ (n) pub
english: Pub "Starlet"
japanese: パブ『スターレット』

definitions: 不可[ふか] (n) wrong, bad, improper, unjustifiable, inadvisable,not allowed, not possible,failing grade
付加[ふか] (n, vs, adj-no) addition, annexation, appendage
負荷[ふか] (n, vs) burden, load (e.g. cpu time, electricity, etc.)
賦課[ふか] (n, vs) levy, imposition
孵化[ふか] (n, vs) incubation, hatching
鱶[ふか] (n) (large) shark
浮華[ふか] (adj-na, n) empty show, frivolity, levity
府下[ふか] (n) suburban districts (of a metropolis), within an urban-prefecture
富家[ふか] (n) wealthy family
english: Fluffy Beds!
japanese: フカフカのベッド！

definitions: 立ち寄る[たちよる] (v5r, vi) to stop by, to drop in for a short visit
english: It's right near Cosmo Candle!
japanese: おたちよりください！聖火コスモキャンドルのすぐそばです！

definitions: 聖火[せいか] (n) sacred fire (torch),Olympic flame
english: It's right near Cosmo Candle!
japanese: おたちよりください！聖火コスモキャンドルのすぐそばです！

definitions: 争う[あらそう] (v5u, vi) to compete, to contest, to contend,to quarrel, to argue, to dispute, to be at variance, to oppose,to deny (e.g. evidence)
english: The people of this canyon hate to compete. So almost everything here are replicas.
japanese: この谷の人間は、あらそいをきらうからね。ここにあるのも、ほとんどレプリカなのさ

definitions: 嫌う[きらう] (v5u, vt) to hate, to dislike, to loathe
english: The people of this canyon hate to compete. So almost everything here are replicas.
japanese: この谷の人間は、あらそいをきらうからね。ここにあるのも、ほとんどレプリカなのさ

definitions: アルバイト (n) part-time job, side job,part-time worker,albite
english: Now hiring!
japanese: アルバイトぼしゅう！

definitions: ぼる (v5r) to ask a high price, to overcharge
english: Now hiring!
japanese: アルバイトぼしゅう！

definitions: 州[しゅう] (suf) state, province, county, oblast, department (of ancient China),continent,dear
週[しゅう] (n, n-suf) week
主[しゅ] (n, adj-no) (one's) master,Lord (Christian ref. to Jesus or God),the main thing, the majority, the primary concern
衆[しゅう] (n, n-suf) great numbers (of people), numerical superiority, masses,people, folk, clique, bunch
宗[しゅう] (n) sect
集[しゅう] (n-suf) collection, compilation
周[しゅう] (n-suf, ctr) Zhou (dynasty of China), Chou,perimeter,counter for laps or circuits
臭[しゅう] (suf) -smell, stinking of,smacking of, hinting of
秀[しゅう] (n) preeminence, superlativeness
醜[しゅう] (n) ugliness
執[しゅう] (n) attachment, obsession, persistence
english: Now hiring!
japanese: アルバイトぼしゅう！

definitions: 求む[もとむ] (v2m-s, vt) to want, to wish for,to request, to demand,to seek, to search for, to pursue (pleasure), to hunt (a job),to purchase, to buy
english: can stand long hours of boredom!
japanese: ガマンづよい方求む！

definitions: 合わせ[あわせ] (n, n-suf, pref) joint together, opposite, facing
english: For details, contact
japanese: くわしいお間い合わせは

definitions: 危機[きき] (n) crisis, critical situation, emergency, pinch
機器[きき] (n) device, equipment, machinery, apparatus
忌諱[きき] (n, vs) displeasure, offense, offence, disliking
聞き[きき] (n) hearing, audible sound,rumour, rumor, hearsay, reputation,tasting (alcohol, tea, etc.)
毀棄[きき] (n, vs) destruction, demolition, damage
嬉々[きき] (adj-t, adv-to) merry, joyful, gleeful
鬼気[きき] (n) ghastly, dreadful
記紀[きき] (n) the Kojiki and Nihonshoki
輝輝[きき] (n) brilliance
煕々[きき] (adv-to, adj-t) spacious,having fun,heavily trafficked
利き[きき] (n) effectiveness, efficacy, efficaciousness,dominance (e.g. of left or right hand),tasting (alcohol, tea, etc.)
english: You came to ask me something, right? Am I right?
japanese: ワシになにかききにきたんじゃろ？　そうじゃろ？

definitions: 要するに[ようするに] (exp, adv) in short, in a word, to sum up, to put it simply, to make a long story short, after all
english: In other words, it doesn't exist for us, but it did for the Ancients.
japanese: ようするにワシらには存在しないが古代種にとっては存在した

definitions: 二[に] (num) two
蓋[ふた] (n) cover, lid, cap
english: The Promised Land is the resting place of the Ancients.
japanese: ミもフタもない言い方をすれば約束の地は古代種の死に場所じゃ

definitions: 死に場所[しにばしょ] (n) place to die, place of death
english: The Promised Land is the resting place of the Ancients.
japanese: ミもフタもない言い方をすれば約束の地は古代種の死に場所じゃ

definitions: 精神[せいしん] (n) mind, spirit, soul, heart, ethos,attitude, mentality, will, intention,spirit (of a matter), essence, fundamental significance
english: The life of the Ancients is one continuous journey. A journey to grow trees and plants, raise animals, and make Mako energy.
japanese: 古代種の人生はきびしい旅の日々じゃ。草や木、動物、あらゆる生き物を増やして精神エネルギーをそだてる旅

definitions: 育てる[そだてる] (v1, vt) to raise, to rear, to bring up,to train, to teach, to educate,to promote the growth of, to nurture, to foster, to develop
english: The life of the Ancients is one continuous journey. A journey to grow trees and plants, raise animals, and make Mako energy.
japanese: 古代種の人生はきびしい旅の日々じゃ。草や木、動物、あらゆる生き物を増やして精神エネルギーをそだてる旅

definitions: 終える[おえる] (v1, vt) to finish,to graduate
english: The place they returned to after their long journey… Their burial land is the Promised Land.
japanese: その旅を終え、星に帰る場所……つまり死に場所が約束の地

definitions: 瞬間[しゅんかん] (n-adv, n-t) moment, second, instant
english: Huh? Supreme Happiness? I believe that, for the Ancients, it was the moment that they were able to return to their Planet, That moment when they were released from their fate, and gained their supreme happiness…
japanese: あん？　至上の幸福？古代種にとっては星に帰る瞬間運命から解き放たれる瞬間それは至上の幸福ではなかったか……と

definitions: 解き放つ[ときはなつ] (v5t, vt) to release
english: Huh? Supreme Happiness? I believe that, for the Ancients, it was the moment that they were able to return to their Planet, That moment when they were released from their fate, and gained their supreme happiness…
japanese: あん？　至上の幸福？古代種にとっては星に帰る瞬間運命から解き放たれる瞬間それは至上の幸福ではなかったか……と

definitions: 真実[しんじつ] (adj-na, adv, n, adj-no) truth, reality
english: At least that's what I believe. I really don't know whether or not it's true.
japanese: ワシはそう考えておるんじゃ。今となっては真実はわからんがの

definitions: 昔話[むかしばなし] (n) old tale, folk tale, legend,reminiscence
english: I'd appreciate it if you didn't talk about such foolish things as legends and old wives tales.
japanese: 悪いんじゃが、伝説とか昔話とかワシにはそんな話しかしてやれんよ

definitions: 原点[げんてん] (n) origin (coordinates), starting point
english: Guess you could say this is where AVALANCHE was born.
japanese: 言ってみりゃ、ここがアバランチの原点だな

definitions: 伝わる[つたわる] (v5r, vi) to be handed down, to be introduced, to be transmitted, to be circulated, to go along, to walk along
english: My job is to gather all the legends and the knowledge of the Planet and to make a book.
japanese: ワシの仕事はこの谷につたわる伝説や星の知識を本にすること

definitions: 柔らかい[やわらかい] (adj-i) soft, tender, pliant, supple, limber, limp,gentle, mild, mellow,informal, light, flexible (e.g. thinking)
english: Welcome to 'Shindra Inn'. It's times like this when a nice soft bed will do you good.
japanese: ようこそ『シルドラ・イン』へ。このような時にこそ人にはやわらかなベッドが必要なのです

definitions: 囁く[ささやく] (v5k, vi) to whisper, to murmur,to rumor, to rumour
english: Were you able to hear the stars whispers?
japanese: 星のささやきはきこえましたか？

definitions: オリジナル (adj-no, n) original,unique (e.g. product), signature, exclusive, one-of-a-kind, custom
english: Welcome. How 'bout our original cocktail, 'Cosmo Candle?'
japanese: いらっしゃい。うちのオリジナルカクテル『コスモキャンドル』はいかがです？

definitions: 柄[がら] (n-suf) pattern, design,body build, figure, physique,essential qualities, character, nature,appropriate to, fitting of, suitable for
殻[がら] (suf) chicken bones (e.g. for soup), chicken carcass,poor-quality coke (coal),left-overs, remnants
ガラ (n) gala
瓦落[がら] (n) sudden fall in stock prices, stock market crash
english: A drink now and then is good for you. It'll relax you a bit. …If you know when to stop.
japanese: お酒はいいですよ。人の心をほがらかにさせますから。……ホドホドならね

definitions: 癒す[いやす] (v5s, vt) to heal, to cure
english: That reminds me. I heard that someone here in Cosmo Canyon is selling some Healing Materia.
japanese: そういえば、このコスモキャニオンのどこかに、いやしのマテリアがあるという話を聞いたことがありますが

definitions: 長話[ながばなし] (n, vs) long talk
english: …Hmm. That's no fun… I wanna tell a story.
japanese: ……チェッ。つまらんのう。長話をしたいのう

definitions: 謎[なぞ] (adj-no) riddle, puzzle, enigma, mystery,enigmatic, mysterious
なんぞ (prt) et cetera, etc., and the like, and so forth
何ぞ[なんぞ] (adv) something,what,why, how
english: He was a Shinra scholar who spent his life studying the Ancients.
japanese: 博士は古代種のナゾを追い続けた 神羅の学者だったのじゃ。

definitions: 学者[がくしゃ] (n, adj-no) scholar
english: He was a Shinra scholar who spent his life studying the Ancients.
japanese: 博士は古代種のナゾを追い続けた 神羅の学者だったのじゃ。

definitions: 生真面目[きまじめ] (adj-na, n) too serious, person who is too serious, honesty, sincerity
english: He was a serious person, you never would have thought he'd be in Shinra.
japanese: 神羅っぽくない生真面目な人じゃ

definitions: 近い[ちかい] (adj-i) near, close, short (distance),close (in time), soon,close (relationship), friendly, intimate,closely related,similar, likeworthy, almost the same
誓い[ちかい] (n) oath, vow
地階[ちかい] (n) basement, cellar
地界[ちかい] (n) boundary, bounds of the earth
地塊[ちかい] (n) landmass, block
知解[ちかい] (n) being enlightened by virtue of knowledge
english: Must've been about 30 years ago, when he found the corpse of an Ancient. He was elated!
japanese: かれこれ３０年ちかく前になるがついに古代種の死体を見つけたとよろこんでおったな

definitions: 死体[したい] (n, adj-no) dead body, corpse, cadaver
english: Must've been about 30 years ago, when he found the corpse of an Ancient. He was elated!
japanese: かれこれ３０年ちかく前になるがついに古代種の死体を見つけたとよろこんでおったな

definitions: 酒好き[さけずき] (adj-na, n) drinker
english: That the old man that likes to drink in Cosmo Canyon, wants to hear about the Ancients.
japanese: コスモキャニオンの酒好きジイさんが古代種の話を聞きたがっているとな

definitions: 山々[やまやま] (adv) (many) mountains,very much (esp. wanting to do something one cannot), greatly, really
english: Well, there's lots to talk about, but most things about the Ancients are all legend and folk tales, and no one knows the truth.
japanese: ま、話したいのはやまやまじゃが古代種のことは言い伝えや伝説ばかりで真実はもうだ～れにもわからんのじゃ

definitions: 鱈腹[たらふく] (adv) (eating or drinking) to one's heart's content
english: Maybe this is the way it should be. Who knows? I'm full of booze…
japanese: これはこれでいいのかもしれん。酒もたらふく飲めたしの……

definitions: 飲める[のめる] (v1) to be able to drink,to be worth drinking
english: Maybe this is the way it should be. Who knows? I'm full of booze…
japanese: これはこれでいいのかもしれん。酒もたらふく飲めたしの……

definitions: 篠[しの] (n) thin-culmed dwarf bamboo (growing in clusters),Japanese transverse bamboo flute (high-pitched; usu. with seven holes),sliver (strand of loose fibers)
english: Maybe this is the way it should be. Who knows? I'm full of booze…
japanese: これはこれでいいのかもしれん。酒もたらふく飲めたしの……

definitions: 地酒[じざけ] (n) local sake
english: Our cocktails are good but our wine is the best! Please stop in the Turtle's Paradise!!
japanese: カクテルもいいけどやっぱり地酒がいちばん！ぜひいちど居酒屋『かめ道楽』へ！！

definitions: 釣り[つり] (n, vs) fishing, angling,change (e.g. for a purchase),trolling, writing false posts online
吊り[つり] (n) hanging, suspending,sling
english: …num…yawn…Sir… You…forgot…your… …change.
japanese: ムニャムニャ……お客さん……おつり……おつりわすれてます……

definitions: 具する[ぐする] (vs-s) to accompany, to follow,to assemble (necessary items), to prepare
english: I'm…I'm so sorry! It seems I've gotten used to being lazy…
japanese: し、しつれいしました！いや、すっかりナマケぐせがついてしまったみたいで……

definitions: 打つかる[ぶつかる] (v5r, vi) to strike against, to collide with, to bump into, to conflict,to encounter, to meet,to clash
english: Oh man… Everything will be over, once Meteor hits…
japanese: あ～あ……あの星がぶつかったらぜんぶおしまいか……

definitions: ディナー (n) dinner
english: Oh, welcome home. You want dinner first? Or…
japanese: あら、おかえりなさい。ね、すぐディナーにする？それとも……

definitions: 勝手[かって] (n-pref) one's own convenience, one's way, selfishness,surroundings, environment, way of doing things,convenience, ease of use,financial circumstances, living, livelihood,kitchen,right hand (in archery), hand that pulls the bowstring,unauthorised (e.g. phone app, WWW site), unofficial
嘗て[かつて] (adv, adj-no) once, before, formerly, ever, former, ex-,never yet, never before, first time, still not happened
english: Wh…who are you? You…can't just come barging into my home uninvited!!
japanese: だ、誰ですかアナタ！か、かってに人のスイートホームに入ってくるなんて！！

definitions: スイートホーム (n) sweet home
english: Wh…who are you? You…can't just come barging into my home uninvited!!
japanese: だ、誰ですかアナタ！か、かってに人のスイートホームに入ってくるなんて！！

definitions: 秒[びょう] (n) second (unit of time)
鋲[びょう] (n) rivet, tack, thumbtack, drawing-pin, hobnail
苗[ミャオ] (n) Miao (people), Hmong
廟[びょう] (n) mausoleum,shrine,the (imperial) court
病[びょう] (n-suf) disease, -pathy
english: What's wrong with Bugenhagen? Is he sick?
japanese: ブーゲン様、どうしたの？びょうきなの？

definitions: 悲しむ[かなしむ] (v5m, vt) to be sad, to mourn for, to regret
english: No need to be sad, even if something should happen. Everything will return to the Planet…Bugenhagen says so.
japanese: 何がおきても悲しむことはない。すべては星に帰っていく……ブーゲンハーゲン様はそうおっしゃいます

definitions: 仰る[おっしゃる] (v5aru, vt) to say, to speak, to tell, to talk
english: No need to be sad, even if something should happen. Everything will return to the Planet…Bugenhagen says so.
japanese: 何がおきても悲しむことはない。すべては星に帰っていく……ブーゲンハーゲン様はそうおっしゃいます

definitions: 話[はなし] (n) talk, speech, chat, story, conversation,discussions, negotiation, argument
放し[はなし] (n-suf) keep ...-ing, have been ...-ing, leaving (something) on, leaving (something) still in use
english: I want to hear Bugenhagen talk with Nanaki like we used to do…
japanese: はやく前みたいにナナキといっしょにブーゲンハーゲン様のおはなしききたいです……

definitions: 旅[たび] (n, vs) travel, trip, journey
度[たび] (n, n-suf, ctr) time (three times, each time, etc.), times
足袋[たび] (n) tabi, [object Object]
english: Nanaki, is it true that Bugenhagen left on a journey? Then that means he's better, right? He IS going to come back soon, right?
japanese: ナナキ、ブーゲンハーゲン様たびにでたって本当なの？なら、元気になったんだよね？またすぐに帰ってくるよね？

definitions: ぷかぷか (adv, adv-to) lightly (floating), buoyantly,puffing (on a pipe, cigarette, etc.),tooting (a trumpet, horn, etc.), blowing (a flute, whistle)
english: …Don't worry. Grandpa will come back floating, saying 'Ho Ho Hoooo' again…
japanese: ……だいじょうぶ。じっちゃんのことだからまたすぐにプカプカやってくるさ。『ホーホーホウ』って……

definitions: 少なくとも[すくなくとも] (adv) at least
english: No, maybe I AM a bit afraid. But, whenever I'm reading 'Study of Planet Life,' I can forget all my fears.
japanese: いや、本当は怖いのかもしれない。でも、少なくとも『星命学』の本をよんでいる間は、そのことを忘れられるんです……

definitions: マジック (n) magic,Magic Marker, felt-tip pen, permanent marker,magic number
english: Received "Magic Source"!
japanese: 『マジックアップ』を手にいれた！

definitions: 無口[むくち] (adj-no, adj-na) reticence, taciturnity, silent person,reticent, taciturn, silent
無口[むこう] (adj-no) astomatous
english: He's quiet and very deep. You thought he was an adult?
japanese: 無口で考え深い。あんたはナナキのことを立派な大人だと思っていたのかな？

definitions: 抉る[くじる] (v5r, vt) to stick into and move around, to dig around in, to pick (i.e. one's teeth)
english: I want to grow up to be able to protect you and the village.
japanese: はやくじっちゃんたちを守れるようになりたかったんだよ

definitions: 滅ぼす[ほろぼす] (v5s, vt) to destroy, to overthrow, to wreck, to ruin
english: To do that now would destroy you in the long run.
japanese: せのびをするといつかは身をほろぼす

definitions: 天[てん] (n) sky,heaven,svarga (heaven-like realm visited as a stage of death and rebirth),deva (divine being of Buddhism)
english: Reaching up into the heavens, threatening to snatch the very stars from the great city of Midgar. You've seen it, haven't you?
japanese: 天にとどけ、星をもつかめとばかりにつくられた魔晄都市。あれを見たのであろう？

definitions: 身の程[みのほど] (exp, n) one's social position, one's place, one's standing
english: Well, that's a bad example. Looking up too much makes you lose perspective.
japanese: あれが悪い見本じゃ。上ばかり見ていて自分の身のほどを忘れておる

definitions: 悲鳴[ひめい] (n, vs) shriek, scream
english: I hear the cries of the Planet.
japanese: 星の悲鳴が聞こえるのじゃ

definitions: 不可能[ふかのう] (adj-na, n) impossible
english: Impossible. What can humans do?
japanese: そんなことは不可能じゃ。人間なんぞに何ができる

definitions: 消す[けす] (v5s, vt) to erase, to delete, to cross out,to turn off power,to extinguish, to put out,to bump off
化す[かす] (v5s, vi) to change into, to convert to, to transform, to be reduced, to influence, to improve (someone)
english: But, then again, I guess it wouldn't hurt to show him.
japanese: しかし、なんじゃ。わしのじまんのアレを見るのはけしてムダではなかろう

definitions: 梃子[てこ] (n) lever
english: Several odd looking people are here.
japanese: またヘンテコな人たちがいっぱいきましたです～

definitions: 逃げる[にげる] (v1, vi) to escape, to run away
english: Don't worry. My machine won't run away. Go and invite your friends.
japanese: そうあわてんでもわしのアレはにげたりせんよ。仲間もさそってくるといい

definitions: ビラ (n) holiday house, villa
片[びら] (n) bill, handbill, flier, flyer, leaflet, poster, placard
english: Here, over here. The door's unlocked, come in.
japanese: お～い、こっちじゃ。とびらのカギは開いとるから入ってくるがいい

definitions: フワフワ (adv-to, adv, vs) lightly (floating, drifting, etc.), buoyantly,soft, fluffy, spongy,unsteadily, flightily, fickly, frivolously
english: 'Ho Ho Hoooo.' I may be light, But I'm not as young as Nanaki.
japanese: 『ホーホーホウ』なんてフワフワしてても、ナナキのように若くはないからして……

definitions: 驚く[おどろく] (v5k, vi) to be surprised, to be astonished
english: Woa! Wooooah! Pretty good, surprisin' me!
japanese: おっ！　おおっ！アタシを驚かせるなんてやるじゃないか！

definitions: 仕組み[しくみ] (n, vs) structure, construction, arrangement, contrivance, mechanism, workings,plan, plot, contrivance
english: All the workings of space are entered into this 3D Holographic System.
japanese: この宇宙の仕組みが全てこの立体ホログラフィシステムにインプットされておる

definitions: 立体[りったい] (n, adj-no) solid body, three-dimensional object,multi-storey car park
english: All the workings of space are entered into this 3D Holographic System.
japanese: この宇宙の仕組みが全てこの立体ホログラフィシステムにインプットされておる

definitions: ホログラフィ (n) holography
english: All the workings of space are entered into this 3D Holographic System.
japanese: この宇宙の仕組みが全てこの立体ホログラフィシステムにインプットされておる

definitions: インプット (n, vs) input
english: All the workings of space are entered into this 3D Holographic System.
japanese: この宇宙の仕組みが全てこの立体ホログラフィシステムにインプットされておる

definitions: 流れ星[ながれぼし] (n) shooting star, falling star, meteor,star (white patch on the forehead of a horse)
english: Hey! A shooting star!
japanese: あっ！　流れ星！

definitions: 感激[かんげき] (n, vs) deep emotion, impression, inspiration
english: I'm so overwhelmed!
japanese: 感激もんですわ～！

definitions: 朽ちる[くちる] (v1, vi) to rot, to decay,to die in obscurity,to be forgotten with time
english: The body decomposes, and returns to the Planet. That much everyone knows. What about their consciousness, their hearts and their souls?
japanese: 身体は朽ち、星に帰る。これは広く知られているな。では、意識、心、精神はどうじゃ？

definitions: 等しい[ひとしい] (adj-i) equal, identical, the same,no different (to), just like, equivalent
english: And not only those of humans, but everything on this Planet. In fact, all living things in the universe, are the same.
japanese: 人間だけではない。この星、いや宇宙に生きるものすべてひとしく

definitions: 混ざる[まざる] (v5r, vi) to be mixed, to be blended with, to associate with, to mingle with, to join
english: The spirits that return to the Planet, merge with one another and roam the Planet.
japanese: 星に帰った精神はまざりあい、星をかけめぐる

definitions: 駆け巡る[かけめぐる] (v5r, vi) to run about, to rush about
english: The spirits that return to the Planet, merge with one another and roam the Planet.
japanese: 星に帰った精神はまざりあい、星をかけめぐる

definitions: 分かれ[わかれ] (n) offshoot, branch, fork
english: They roam, converge, and divide, becoming a swell, called the 'Lifestream'.
japanese: 星をかけめぐり、まざり、分かれ『ライフストリーム』と呼ばれるうねりとなる

definitions: 畝ねり[うねり] (n) undulation, winding, meandering,swell (of waves), surge, billow, roller
english: They roam, converge, and divide, becoming a swell, called the 'Lifestream'.
japanese: 星をかけめぐり、まざり、分かれ『ライフストリーム』と呼ばれるうねりとなる

definitions: 祝福[しゅくふく] (n, vs, adj-no) blessing
english: A new life…children are blessed with Spirit Energy and are brought into the world.
japanese: 新しい命……子供たちは精神エネルギーの祝福を受けてうまれてくる

definitions: 生まれる[うまれる] (v1, vi) to be born
english: A new life…children are blessed with Spirit Energy and are brought into the world.
japanese: 新しい命……子供たちは精神エネルギーの祝福を受けてうまれてくる

definitions: 例外[れいがい] (n, adj-no) exception
english: Of course there are exceptions, but this is the way of the world.
japanese: むろんいくつかの例外はあるがこれがこの世界の仕組みじゃ

definitions: 流れ[ながれ] (n) stream, current, flow,course of events
english: Ho Ho Hoooo. Spirit Energy is efficient BECAUSE it exists within nature.
japanese: ホーホーホウ。精神エネルギーは自然の流れの中でこそその役割を果たすのじゃ

definitions: 役割[やくわり] (n) part, assigning (allotment of) parts, role, duties
english: Ho Ho Hoooo. Spirit Energy is efficient BECAUSE it exists within nature.
japanese: ホーホーホウ。精神エネルギーは自然の流れの中でこそその役割を果たすのじゃ

definitions: 果たす[はたす] (v5s, aux-v) to accomplish, to achieve, to carry out, to fulfill, to fulfil, to realize, to execute, to perform, to do,to do ... completely, to do ... entirely
english: Ho Ho Hoooo. Spirit Energy is efficient BECAUSE it exists within nature.
japanese: ホーホーホウ。精神エネルギーは自然の流れの中でこそその役割を果たすのじゃ

definitions: 加工[かこう] (n, vs) manufacturing, processing, treatment, machining
english: When Spirit Energy is forcefully extracted, and manufactured, it can't accomplish its true purpose.
japanese: むりやり吸い上げられ加工された精神エネルギーは本来の役割を果たさん

definitions: ずんずん (adv) rapidly (e.g. progress, moving forward), growing visibly, quickly, steadily, by leaps and bounds
english: Everyday Mako reactors suck up Spirit Energy, diminishing it.
japanese: 魔晄炉に吸い上げられずんずん減っていく精神エネルギー

definitions: 過度[かど] (adj-na, n, adj-no) excess, immoderation
english: Spirit Energy is compressed in reactors and processed into Mako energy. All living things are being used up and thrown away.
japanese: 魔晄炉によって過度に凝縮される精神エネルギー。魔晄エネルギーなどと名づけられ使いすてられているのは、すべて星の命じゃ

definitions: 滅ぼす[ほろぼす] (v5s, vt) to destroy, to overthrow, to wreck, to ruin
english: In other words, Mako energy will only destroy the Planet…
japanese: すなわち魔晄エネルギーはこの星を滅ぼすのみ……じゃ

definitions: 正に[まさに] (adv) exactly, surely, certainly, just,right then, just then, at that moment,just (about to), on the verge (of doing or happening),duly, naturally
english: …no time for humming now. The Planet is nearing imminent death.
japanese: ……と言ってられる場合じゃないんじゃの。まさに星の死が近づいておる

definitions: 救う[すくう] (v5u, vt) to rescue from, to help out of, to save
掬う[すくう] (v5u, vt) to scoop, to ladle out
巣食う[すくう] (v5u, vi) to build (a nest), to nest,to haunt (a place), to hang out (somewhere)
english: I promised my guys someday… when we saved the Planet from the Shinra, that we'd all go to Cosmo Canyon and celebrate…
japanese: あいつらと約束してた。いつか……神羅からこの星をすくったその時にはコスモキャニオンへ行って祝杯をあげよう……

definitions: 祝杯[しゅくはい] (n) toast, congratulatory cup
english: I promised my guys someday… when we saved the Planet from the Shinra, that we'd all go to Cosmo Canyon and celebrate…
japanese: あいつらと約束してた。いつか……神羅からこの星をすくったその時にはコスモキャニオンへ行って祝杯をあげよう……

definitions: 憎い[にくい] (adj-i) hateful, abominable, poor-looking, detestable,amazing, fantastic, admirable, lovely, wonderful
english: We all… we all hate the Shinra…
japanese: オレたちは……オレは……神羅が憎かっただけ……

definitions: 正義[せいぎ] (n) justice, right, righteousness, correct meaning
english: I don't care if it's for justice or revenge, or whatever. I don't care…
japanese: 正義だとか復讐だとかそんなことは他のやつらが勝手に決めりゃいい

definitions: 焚き火[たきび] (n, vs) open-air fire (e.g. for garden refuse), bonfire,open fire (e.g. in a kitchen)
english: Bonfires are funny, aren't they?
japanese: たき火って不思議ね

definitions: 削ぐ[そぐ] (v5g, vt) to chip (off), to shave (off), to slice (off), to sharpen,to dampen (e.g. enthusiasm), to discourage, to weaken, to reduce
english: What a boring place, just like I thought. I wanna go somewhere! Let's go find some Materia!
japanese: 予想どおり、たいくつなとこだね～。はやく、どっか行こ！そいで、マテリア探そ！

definitions: 濾過[ろか] (n, vs) filtration, filtering, percolation
露華[ろか] (n) beautiful dew, [object Object]
ＬＯＣＡ[ロカ] (n) loss-of-coolant accident, LOCA
炉火[ろか] (n) hearthfire, ingle, open fire in a fireplace
english: I wonder how many years it's been… Gosh, it brings back memories……
japanese: こんなん、何年ぶりやろか……な～んや、いろんなこと思いだしますなぁ……

definitions: 思い出す[おもいだす] (v5s, vt) to recall, to remember, to recollect
english: I wonder how many years it's been… Gosh, it brings back memories……
japanese: こんなん、何年ぶりやろか……な～んや、いろんなこと思いだしますなぁ……

definitions: 胸[むね] (n) chest, breast,breasts, bosom, bust,heart,lungs,stomach,heart, mind, feelings
english: When I talk about my Mother, I am full of pride and joy…
japanese: 母さんの話をするとオイラの胸はほこらしい気持ちではちきれそうになる

definitions: はち切れる[はちきれる] (v1, vi) to be filled to bursting, to burst
english: When I talk about my Mother, I am full of pride and joy…
japanese: 母さんの話をするとオイラの胸はほこらしい気持ちではちきれそうになる

definitions: 見殺し[みごろし] (n) letting (someone) die without helping
english: Of course. He…left Mother for dead.
japanese: 当たりまえだよ。あいつは……母さんを見殺しにしたんだ

definitions: 放り出す[ほうりだす] (v5s, vt) to throw out,to drop, to toss, to dump,to abandon, to neglect, to leave behind, to give up,to dismiss, to fire, to expel
ひり出す[ひりだす] (v5s, vt) to expel, to eject, to push out, to force out
english: When the Gi tribe attacked, he ran off by himself, leaving Mother and the people of the Canyon!
japanese: ギ族が攻めてきたときあいつは１人で逃げ出した。母さんと谷の人たちを放り出してさ！

definitions: 代々[だいだい] (n-adv, n-t) for generations, hereditary, generation after generation
english: I wonder what he wants to show him? Hmm, maybe it's Materia that's been passed down for generations?
japanese: 見せたいものって、アレかな？ホラ、この谷に代々つたわるマテリアとかさ！

definitions: 年寄り[としより] (n) old person, elderly person, senior citizen,trustee of the Japan Sumo Association, [object Object],senior statesman (of the Tokugawa shogunate),important local official (under the Tokugawa Shogunate)
english: You want an old man like me to go first? I'll be right behind you.
japanese: 年寄りに先を行かせるのか？わしは後ろからついていくよ

definitions: 封印[ふういん] (vs) seal,to seal (e.g. a letter), to affix a seal, to seal up
english: Sealed Cave
japanese: 封印の洞窟

definitions: 亡霊[ぼうれい] (n) ghost, the dead, departed spirits, apparition
english: Everyone here's a Ghost of the Gi tribe, killed in a certain battle.
japanese: ここにいるのはみなギ族の亡霊じゃ。ある戦士に倒された、な

definitions: 死す[しす] (vs-c, vi) to die
english: The vengeful spirits of the Gi didn't disappear, and couldn't return to the Lifestream…
japanese: しかし、死してなおギ族の憎悪の精神は消えず、ライフストリームに帰ることすらこばんでいるのじゃ……

definitions: 憎悪[ぞうお] (n, vs) hatred
english: The vengeful spirits of the Gi didn't disappear, and couldn't return to the Lifestream…
japanese: しかし、死してなおギ族の憎悪の精神は消えず、ライフストリームに帰ることすらこばんでいるのじゃ……

definitions: 崩す[くずす] (v5s, vt) to destroy, to demolish, to pull down, to tear down, to level,to disturb, to put into disorder, to throw off balance, to make shaky,to relax (one's pose), to make oneself at ease,to break (a bill), to change, to make change,to write in cursive style, to write in running style,to break into a smile, to let off a smile,to lower (a price)
english: Break it open
japanese: くずしてみる

definitions: そっと (vs) softly, gently, quietly,secretly, stealthily,to leave alone, to leave as it is
率土[そっと] (n) face of the earth
english: Leave it alone
japanese: そっとしておく

definitions: 河口[かこう] (n, adj-no) mouth of river, estuary
下降[かこう] (n, vs) descent, fall, drop, decline, downturn, subsidence
加工[かこう] (n, vs) manufacturing, processing, treatment, machining

囲う[かこう] (v5u, vt) to enclose, to surround, to encircle, to fence, to wall in,to shelter (e.g. a criminal), to shield, to hide, to protect,to keep (e.g. a mistress),to store (vegetables, fruit, etc.), to preserve,to protect
課口[かこう] (n) men who were subject to taxes and forced labor (ritsuryo system)
歌稿[かこう] (n) manuscript of poem
河港[かこう] (n) river port
火光[かこう] (n) firelight
火口[かこう] (n) crater, caldera,burner (e.g. on a furnace)
下行[かこう] (adj-na, n) descending
華甲[かこう] (n) aged 61
佳肴[かこう] (n) delicacy, rare treat, good-eating fish
化工[かこう] (n) chemical engineering
花梗[かこう] (n, adj-no) flower stalk, peduncle
下綱[かこう] (n) infraclass
架構[かこう] (n) framework, frame, structure
仮構[かこう] (n) fiction, fabrication, concoction, invention,falsework (scaffolding, etc.)
花香[かこう] (n) fragrance of flowers
english: Received "Added Effect" Materia!
japanese: 『ついかこうか』のマテリアを手にいれた！

definitions: 残忍[ざんにん] (adj-na, n) brutal, cruel, merciless, ruthless, cold-blooded
english: Even though the Gi outnumbered us, they could not attack through here because the passage is too narrow.
japanese: ギ族はわしらより体も大きくなにより残忍じゃ。ここから攻め入られたらひとたまりもなかったじゃろう

definitions: ブラック (n) black
english: Received "Black M-phone"!
japanese: 『ブラックメガホン』を手にいれた！

definitions: フェアリー (n) fairy
english: Received "Fairy Ring"!
japanese: 『フェアリーリング』を手にいれた！

definitions: リング (n) ring
english: Received "Fairy Ring"!
japanese: 『フェアリーリング』を手にいれた！

definitions: 淀む[よどむ] (v5m, vi) to stagnate,to settle (at the bottom), to deposit, to be sedimented,to become sluggish, to become dull, to become stale,to be delayed, to hesitate, to falter, to stammer, to stumble
english: After death… The ghosts of the Gi. Like stagnant air…
japanese: 死してなお……ギ族の亡霊が……よどんだ大気のように……

definitions: 間違い[まちがい] (n) mistake, error, blunder,accident, mishap, trouble,improper conduct (e.g. between man and woman), indiscretion
english: Now I know that it wasn't a mistake bringing you here…
japanese: やはりお前を連れてきたのは間違いではなかったようじゃ……

definitions: 二度と[にどと] (adv) never again
english: But he was never able to return to town…
japanese: そして自分は二度と村へもどることは

definitions: 毒矢[どくや] (n) poisoned arrow (dart)
english: Even after the Gi's poisonous arrows turned his body to stone…… Even after they all ran away… Seto, continued to protect us.
japanese: ギ族の毒矢で体を石にされても……ギ族がすべて逃げだしたあとも……戦士セトはここを守りつづけた

definitions: 卑怯[ひきょう] (adj-na, n) cowardice, meanness, unfairness
秘境[ひきょう] (n) unexplored region, one of the most secluded regions
比況[ひきょう] (n) comparison, similitude
悲境[ひきょう] (n) adversity, sad circumstances
秘教[ひきょう] (n, adj-no) esoteric religion
english: You thought that he was a coward and ran away. But he, alone risked his life to protect Cosmo Canyon.
japanese: たとえ、逃げだしたひきょうものと思われても、たった１人、命をかけてコスモキャニオンを守ったんじゃ

definitions: 正直[しょうじき] (adv) honest, frank, candid, straightforward,honestly, frankly
english: Honestly, I don't think it can be done.
japanese: 正直なところ、そんなことができるとは、わしには思えん

definitions: 思える[おもえる] (v1) to seem, to appear likely
english: Honestly, I don't think it can be done.
japanese: 正直なところ、そんなことができるとは、わしには思えん

definitions: 形[かたち] (n) form, shape, figure,visage
english: Even if they stop Sephiroth, everything will perish.
japanese: セフィロスとやらを倒しても同じこと。かたちあるものは必ず滅す、じゃ

definitions: 滅する[めっする] (vs-s, vt) to be destroyed, to perish, to go out (e.g. fire),to destroy, to get rid of, to extinguish
english: Even if they stop Sephiroth, everything will perish.
japanese: セフィロスとやらを倒しても同じこと。かたちあるものは必ず滅す、じゃ

definitions: 一員[いちいん] (n) person, member
english: I've been thinking if there was anything WE could do, as a part of the Planet, something to help a Planet already in misery…
japanese: こんなにも星が苦しんでいるのに星の一員、いや、星の一部であるわしらにできることは本当に何もないのか、とな

definitions: 代わり[かわり] (n, adj-no) substitute, replacement, substituting, replacing,stand-in, proxy, alternate, deputy, relief, successor,compensation, exchange, return,second helping, another cup, seconds,upcoming program, upcoming programme
代わり[がわり] (suf) substitute for ...
english: That is why, Nanaki, you must go with them! For my sake.
japanese: だからナナキよ、行けい！わしの代わりにすべてを見とどけるんじゃ

definitions: 恥じる[はじる] (v1) to feel ashamed
english: I'll come back a warrior true to that noble name! So please, Grandpa…
japanese: その名にはじない戦士になって帰ってくる！だから、じっちゃん！
